sentence.Network_en: Pu Zhiren whom I met beside Lake Cuihu was a skilled horticulturist of this kind.
sentence.Network_cn: 普之仁就是这样一位能工巧匠,我在翠湖边上会到他.

sentence.Network_en: Burbank ( American horticulturist ) would hurry nature bygrafting together branches of different fruits.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时, 伯班克 通过把不同的果树枝嫁接在一起加快自然的进程.

sentence.Network_en: The horticulturist developed a new type of rose.
sentence.Network_cn: 园艺师培育了玫瑰的一个新品种.
